ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows 7 Professional 64-Bit; Intel Core i7 Quad Core 4th Gen Haswell CPU (2.4GHz, 6MB L3 Cache) up to 3.4GHz with Turbo Boost Technology
17.3" Full HD TruBrite® LED Backlit Display (1920x1080); Blu-ray DiscTM RE Burner/Writer Optical Drive; HDMI® with 4K Ultra HD output capability
2GB GDDR3 NVIDIA ® GeForce® GT 740M with OptimusTM Tech; 8GB DDR3L 1600MHz SDRAM (4 Dimm); HD Webcam & Microphone; Intel Gigabit LAN
128GB Primary Performance Solid State (SSD) SATA III Hard Drive; 1TB 5400RPM Secondary SATA III Data Storage Hard Drive; harmon/kardon Quad Speakers
Full Size Backlit Keyboard with Numeric Keypad, Intel 7260 [2x2] Wi-Fi & Bluetooth v4.0 (300Mbps) with WiDi Support, 1 Year Toshiba Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite P70-ABT3G22 Quad Core Premium Edition Windows 7 PRO Laptop PC (Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 17.3" 1920 x 1080p, Blu-Ray Burner, 2GB NVIDIA Gaming, 128GB Performance SSD, 1TB Secondary Storage, Windows 7 Professional, 8GB RAM)
